message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to go that low. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice! I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm starting to get a bit hesitant about selling to you at a lower price than I initially offered. I think this is my final counteroffer.
